snippet: The late prime minister had, with Ronald Reagan, the most important Anglo-American alliance since that of Winston Churchill and Franklin Roosevelt.
lead_paragraph: The late prime minister had, with Ronald Reagan, the most important Anglo-American alliance since that of Winston Churchill and Franklin Roosevelt.

headline.print_headline: Thatcher, Reagan and Their Special Relationship
headline.seo: Thatcher, Reagan and Their Special Relationship
headline.main: Thatcher, Reagan and Their Special Relationship
